title: A letter from the Marqves of Argile and Sir William Armyn in the name of themselves and their confederates, to Sir Thomas Glemham, dated at Barwicke, January 20 : with the answer of Sir Thomas Glemham and the commanders and gentry of Northumberland, dated at Newcastle, January 23.
author: Argyll, Archibald Campbell, Marquis of, 1598-1661.
publisher: Printed at York by Stephen Bulkley,
notes: Imperfect: tightly bound with loss of print.
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
